001.comments: For September 2020W Term 1, this course will run online. No regular meetings in T2 and students will present demonstrations at local schools in T2. Minimum 68% cumulative average required to be allowed in the course. Students who do not meet the requirement will be removed from the course before course starts.

00W.comments: Please sign up on the waitlist if you wish to take PHYS 420C. Minimum 68% cumulative average required to be allowed in the course. Qualified students will be moved into the course from the waitlist.

description: The students will prepare, under the supervision of a faculty member, a demonstration or series of demonstrations intended to illustrate physical principles to diverse audiences. Intended for third- or fourth-year Physics Majors and Math/Science Education students.
